End time : 14/06/2023 13:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement :Following our continuous improvement policy, we will perfom an maintenance on LDP.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][ManagedKubernetesService] Managed nodes OS upgrades for clusters in NO DOWNTIME policy update configuration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 13, 08:30 UTC  -  Jun 15, 16:00 UTC

Apr 13, 12:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/06/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 15/06/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected but you should have enough nodes in your K8S cluster to allow a rolling upgrade of them and to absorb a rescheduling of your workload without downtime.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will upgrade all public cloud instances (a.k.a. nodes) managed by the MKS team and running in your Kubernetes clusters to upgrade them from the operating system Ubuntu 18.04.06 LTS version to the Ubuntu 22.04.02 LTS version.
Only clusters with an upgrade policy set to "NO DOWNTIME" are targeted by this maintenance.
To prevent non wanted upgrade on services configured in NO DOWNTIME mode, we leave it up to the customers more time to manage this upgrade by themselves.
But, as the Ubuntu 18.04 LTS support will be disabled on the 31/05/2023, be aware that in case of critical vulnerability, we kept the right to force upgrade impacted services to patch as soon as possible vulnerable managed control planes and nodes.

entry.title: [EU/CA][LogsDataPlatform] - End of redirection for old OSD instances

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 1, 12:00 - 14:00 UTC

Apr 15, 03:06 UTC

End time : 01/06/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement :Following our continuous improvement policy, we will perfom an maintenance on LDP.
Please note that after this maintenance, old uri of your OpenSearch Dashboards instances will stop to be redirected.

entry.title: [Global][Managed Kubernetes Service] - Deprecation of the Kubernetes version 1.23
entry.content:
May 11, 15:48 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 11, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 5, 07:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/05/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 11/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Delivery and reset of Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.23 disabled
Ongoing actions : Following our end-of-support policy, the Managed Kubernetes Service team will mark as deprecated the Kubernetes version 1.23.
It will no longer be possible to create Managed Kubernetes clusters under the 1.23 version, or to reset existing clusters into this version.
For more details, please refer to these documentations: https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/eos-eol-policies/ and https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/kubernetes-plugins-software-versions-reserved-resources/

entry.content:
May 4, 16:43 UTC

End Time : 04/05/2023 16:51 UTC
Root cause : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/1kccvfv8d8ny
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 4, 13:45 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : The current incident is still ongoing. In the meantime, our technical teams will temporarily migrate a part of the data to improve the performance of the product before the implementation of the final fix.

Identified - Start time : 22/03/2023 08:00 UTC

Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it
Related incident : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/1kccvfv8d8ny
